Key Match Events: Edson Álvarez scored a 101st-minute goal to save Mexico
The match went to a penalty shootout
César Huerta scored the winning penalty for Mexico
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico won an absurd penalty shootout
El Tri qualified for the 2024 Copa América
Without Mexico, the 2023 Nations League final was half-empty
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heavy rain delayed the match by 30 minutes
Julián Quiñones missed a close-range shot
